alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 03 at 2:25AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Blount, southern Cocke and Sevier Counties through 415 AM EST... At 325 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles east of Eagleton Village to 12 miles north of Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area to near Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek to 6 miles northwest of Town Of Santeetlah. Movement was east at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sevierville, Gatlinburg, Pigeon Forge, Smoky Mountains-Newfound Gap, Smoky Mountains-Twentymile Creek, Smoky Mountains-Fontana Area, Smoky Mountains-Balsam Mountain, Pittman Center, Townsend and Del Rio. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; NW Blount; North Sevier; Northwest Cocke; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene
